DocAttribute.Name: Position
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition from ISO/CD 10303-46:1992: The Cartesian point indicates the position of the light source. Definition from VRML97 - ISO/IEC 14772-1:1997: A Point light node illuminates geometry within radius of its location.

DocAttribute.Name: Radius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The maximum distance from the light source for a surface still to be illuminated. Definition from VRML97 - ISO/IEC 14772-1:1997: A Point light node illuminates geometry within radius of its location.

DocAttribute.Name: ConstantAttenuation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition from ISO/CD 10303-46:1992: This real indicates the value of the attenuation in the lighting equation that is constant.

DocAttribute.Name: DistanceAttenuation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition from ISO/CD 10303-46:1992: This real indicates the value of the attenuation in the lighting equation that proportional to the distance from the light source.

DocAttribute.Name: QuadricAttenuation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition from the IAI: This real indicates the value of the attenuation in the lighting equation that proportional to the square value of the distance from the light source.
